example.parse: (IP-HLN (NP-SBJ (ADJP (QP (NP (NN 世界)) (QP (OD 第一))) (ADJP (JJ 大))) (NP (NN 峡谷))) (VP (PP (P 比) (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 原先)) (VP (VV 认为) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-1))))) (DEC 的))))) (ADVP (AD 更)) (VP (VA 窄))))
